main.ts:
makerbit.onIrButton(IrButton.Power, IrButtonAction.Pressed, function () {
    tiaowu = 1
    for (let index = 0; index <= qupu.length - 1; index++) {
        music.playTone(yingfu[qupu[index]], 500 / jiepai[index])
    }
    basic.pause(1000)
    tiaowu = 0
    Tinybit.CarCtrl(Tinybit.CarState.Car_Stop)
})
makerbit.onIrButton(IrButton.Left, IrButtonAction.Pressed, function () {
    Tinybit.CarCtrlSpeed2(Tinybit.CarState.Car_Left, 0, sudu)
})
makerbit.onIrButton(IrButton.Right, IrButtonAction.Pressed, function () {
    Tinybit.CarCtrlSpeed2(Tinybit.CarState.Car_Right, sudu, 0)
})
makerbit.onIrButton(IrButton.Up, IrButtonAction.Pressed, function () {
    Tinybit.CarCtrlSpeed2(Tinybit.CarState.Car_Run, sudu, sudu)
})
makerbit.onIrButton(IrButton.TLeft, IrButtonAction.Pressed, function () {
    Tinybit.CarCtrlSpeed2(Tinybit.CarState.Car_SpinLeft, sudu, sudu)
})
function tiaowudaima () {
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Big(Tinybit.enColor.Red)
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().showColor(neopixel.colors(NeoPixelColors.Red))
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().show()
    Tinybit.CarCtrlSpeed2(Tinybit.CarState.Car_Run, 90, 90)
    basic.pause(500)
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().showColor(neopixel.colors(NeoPixelColors.Orange))
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().show()
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Big(Tinybit.enColor.Green)
    Tinybit.CarCtrlSpeed2(Tinybit.CarState.Car_Back, 90, 90)
    basic.pause(1000)
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().showColor(neopixel.colors(NeoPixelColors.Yellow))
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().show()
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Big(Tinybit.enColor.Blue)
    Tinybit.CarCtrlSpeed2(Tinybit.CarState.Car_Left, 0, 90)
    basic.pause(500)
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().showColor(neopixel.colors(NeoPixelColors.Green))
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().show()
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Big(Tinybit.enColor.White)
    Tinybit.CarCtrlSpeed2(Tinybit.CarState.Car_Right, 90, 0)
    basic.pause(500)
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().showColor(neopixel.colors(NeoPixelColors.Blue))
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().show()
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Big(Tinybit.enColor.Cyan)
    Tinybit.CarCtrlSpeed2(Tinybit.CarState.Car_SpinLeft, 90, 90)
    basic.pause(500)
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().showColor(neopixel.colors(NeoPixelColors.Indigo))
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().show()
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Big(Tinybit.enColor.Yellow)
    Tinybit.CarCtrlSpeed2(Tinybit.CarState.Car_SpinRight, 90, 90)
    basic.pause(500)
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().showColor(neopixel.colors(NeoPixelColors.Purple))
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().show()
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Big(Tinybit.enColor.Blue)
    Tinybit.CarCtrlSpeed2(Tinybit.CarState.Car_Right, 90, 0)
    basic.pause(500)
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().showColor(neopixel.colors(NeoPixelColors.White))
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().show()
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Big(Tinybit.enColor.White)
    Tinybit.CarCtrlSpeed2(Tinybit.CarState.Car_Left, 0, 90)
    basic.pause(500)
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().showColor(neopixel.colors(NeoPixelColors.Blue))
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().show()
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Big(Tinybit.enColor.Cyan)
    Tinybit.CarCtrlSpeed2(Tinybit.CarState.Car_SpinRight, 90, 90)
    basic.pause(500)
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().showColor(neopixel.colors(NeoPixelColors.Indigo))
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().show()
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Big(Tinybit.enColor.Yellow)
    Tinybit.CarCtrlSpeed2(Tinybit.CarState.Car_SpinLeft, 90, 90)
    basic.pause(500)
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().showColor(neopixel.colors(NeoPixelColors.Black))
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().show()
    Tinybit.RGB_Car_Big(Tinybit.enColor.OFF)
    Tinybit.CarCtrlSpeed2(Tinybit.CarState.Car_SpinRight, 0, 0)
}
makerbit.onIrButton(IrButton.Down, IrButtonAction.Pressed, function () {
    Tinybit.CarCtrlSpeed2(Tinybit.CarState.Car_Back, sudu, sudu)
})
makerbit.onIrButton(IrButton.Plus, IrButtonAction.Pressed, function () {
    if (sudu > 50) {
        sudu += -10
        music.playTone(880, music.beat(BeatFraction.Quarter))
    }
})
makerbit.onIrButton(IrButton.TRight, IrButtonAction.Pressed, function () {
    Tinybit.CarCtrlSpeed2(Tinybit.CarState.Car_SpinRight, sudu, sudu)
})
makerbit.onIrButton(IrButton.Minus, IrButtonAction.Pressed, function () {
    if (sudu < 250) {
        sudu += 10
        music.playTone(988, music.beat(BeatFraction.Quarter))
    }
})
makerbit.onIrButton(IrButton.BEEP, IrButtonAction.Pressed, function () {
    Tinybit.CarCtrl(Tinybit.CarState.Car_Stop)
})
let jiepai: number[] = []
let qupu: number[] = []
let yingfu: number[] = []
let tiaowu = 0
let sudu = 0
sudu = 80
tiaowu = 0
Tinybit.RGB_Car_Program().clear()
Tinybit.RGB_Car_Big(Tinybit.enColor.OFF)
makerbit.connectIrReceiver(DigitalPin.P8)
yingfu = [

basic.forever(function () {
    if (tiaowu == 1) {
        tiaowudaima()
    }
})
